銋銋銋

銋字的基本解释

銋
rén
刀口卷折：“今剑或绝侧羸文，齧缺卷銋”。
弱。

銋
rěn
〔鍖銋〕声音舒缓。

銋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rén］
［《廣韻》如林切，平侵，日。］
亦作“鈓1”。
卷曲。参见“卷銋”。
[②]［rěn］
［《廣韻》如甚切，上寢，日。］
见“鍖銋”。

銋字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銋； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1304第12
【廣韻】【集韻】?如林切，音壬。【字林】濡也。【博雅】韏也。　又【集韻】尼凜切，音拰。鍖銋，聲不進貌。【王褒·洞簫賦】行鍖銋而龢囉。【註】銋，奴錦反。鍖銋，聲不進貌。　【集韻】或作鈓。

銋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
銋字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous
rén
Knife-edge curling: "Today's sword may be an absolute leiwen, and the lack of curling is biting."
weak.
Glutinous
rěn
〔鍖銋〕The sound is soothing.
Glutinous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rén］
["Guangyun" such as Lin Qi, flat invasion, day. ]
Also known as "鈓1".
curly. See "Volumes".
[②] [rěn]
["Guangyun" Ru Shiqie, go to bed, day. ]
See "鍖銋".
Glutinous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銋; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1304 No. 12
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Like Lin Qi, Yin Ren. [Word Lin] Ye Ye. [Bo Ya] Yun Ye.　[Jiyun] Nirin cut, soundtrack.鍖銋, the sound is silent. 【Wang Bao·Dongxiao Fu】Going smoothly and harmoniously. [Note] 銋, the slave Jin is against.鍖銋, the sound is silent.　【Ji Yun】Or make a punctuation.
Glutinous

Nothing.
rén
только в сочетаниях: см. 卷銋
